name: WTB Riddler 700 Tire
description: From trail rubber experts WTB, the Riddler is designed for out-and-out speed on gravel and dirt. The narrower 37mm option is a great gravel racing or dry-course cyclocross tire, while the 45mm is a great choice for rough road and trail adventures further afield. The Riddler is easy to set up tubeless, allowing you to take advantage of the light weight and decreased rolling resistance that tubeless offers.Tubeless ready.Aggressive outer knobs help with cornering, while the low-profile center tread is ideal for high speeds on consistent surfaces.37mm width is ideal for dry cyclocross courses or gravel racing.45mm width is made for rougher gravel rides and drop-bar bikepacking.Tan sidewalls add a retro touch.
